amount.header: Please select an amount or enter a custom amount

payment.subHeader: Please add your payment information below
payment.emailText: I'd like to receive email updates from Send Chinatown Love, such as when the merchant receives my donation/purchase or when a new merchant is onboarded
payment.donationText1: By proceeding with your transaction, you understand that you are making a donation to
payment.donationText2: No goods or services were exchanged for this donation.
payment.voucherText1: By proceeding with your purchase, you understand that the voucher card is not redeemable for cash and can only be used at
payment.voucherText2: All purchases are final. In the event that the merchant is no longer open at the time of redemption, Send Chinatown Love Inc. will not be able to refund your purchase.

buyMeal.subheader: Send Chinatown Love will connect merchants with local organizations that will distribute your gifted meals to our community in need.
buyMeal.prompt: Please enter how many meals to gift
buyMeal.explanationFirst: By gifting a meal, your donation will still go directly to the merchant.
buyMeal.explanationSecond: Our partners will then distribute vouchers with those who can benefit the most from a free meal.

body.header: Sorry Your Dumpling Was Not Found
body.subHeader1: The page you are trying does not exist or has been moved.
body.subHeader2: Please try going back to the homepage.
